prompt.content:
Please fill the dataset card for the XCOPA dataset. You can use the following schema:
languages: 
- "List of ISO 639-1 code for languages covered in the dataset"
- lang1
- lang2
...
- langM
pretty_name: "Pretty Name of the Dataset"
tags:
- tag1
- tag2
dataset_info:
    features:
        - name: "name of the feature1"
          dtype: "dtype of the feature1"
        ...
        - name: "name of the featureN"
          dtype: "dtype of the featureN"
    splits:
        train:
            num_examples: "number of examples in the train split"
        validation:
            num_examples: "number of examples in the validation split"
        test:
            num_examples: "number of examples in the test split"
dataset_summary: "Summary of the dataset's description"

pretty_name: "XCOPA: Cross-lingual Choice of Plausible Alternatives"
tags:
- natural language processing
- common sense reasoning
- multilingual
dataset_info:
    features:
        - name: "premise"
          dtype: "string"
        - name: "question"
          dtype: "string"
        - name: "choice1"
          dtype: "string"
        - name: "choice2"
          dtype: "string"
        - name: "label"
          dtype: "int32"
    splits:
        train:
            num_examples: "40597"
        validation:
            num_examples: "4770"
        test:
            num_examples: "4770"
dataset_summary: "XCOPA is a dataset for evaluating the performance of models in cross-lingual common sense reasoning tasks. It is derived from the English
